SELECT orders_num, MIN(img) AS img, MIN(name) AS name, SUM(count) AS count, MIN(orders_date) AS orders_date, MIN(status) AS status FROM (SELECT o.orders_num, b.img, b.name, COUNT(*) AS count, MIN(o.orders_date) AS orders_date, MIN(s.name) AS status FROM orders_detail od JOIN orders o ON o.orders_num = od.orders_num JOIN books b ON b.books_id = od.books_id_id JOIN status s ON s.status_id = o.status_id_id JOIN users u ON u.users_id = o.users_id_id WHERE u.users_id = #{users_id} GROUP BY o.orders_num, b.img, b.name ) AS orders_sub GROUP BY orders_num ORDER BY orders_date ASC
